content: The Tablet of the Three Supreme is one of the many Curios items you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. Like the rest of these items, once found, it can be equipped from the Equipment menu.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tablet_of_the_Three_Supreme.md', within the main section titled 'Tablet of the Three Supreme'.
The content is as follows:
The Tablet of the Three Supreme is one of the many Curios items you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. Like the rest of these items, once found, it can be equipped from the Equipment menu.
